Package org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.behaviours

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractComputedBehaviour<V extends NiAmountCell>
    the abstract behaviour of a computed measure/column.
    AverageAmountBehaviour
    the behaviour of an entity which equals sum(cells) / nr(cells)
    CurrencySplittingStrategy
    the VSplitStrategy of a Currency entity - measures vertically divided by the original currency
    DateTokenBehaviour
    the behaviour of a DateCell-populated column.
    FilteredMeasureBehaviour
    the behaviour of an entity which filter the cells by a value
    FormulaAverageBehaviour
    the behaviour of an entity which has value = formula(tokens) for cells, but outputs average(formula) in the trails (and maybe the original cells).
    FormulaicAmountBehaviour
    the behaviour of an entity which has value = formula(tokens).
    GeneratedColumnBehaviour<K extends Cell,V extends NiOutCell>
    an abstract behaviour of a fully-custom aggregated column/measure.
    GeneratedIntegerBehaviour
    GeneratedColumnBehaviour which generates integers
    MeasureDividingBehaviour  
    NumericalColumnBehaviour
    the behaviour of a once-per-entity column (like Proposed Project Cost)
    PercentageTokenBehaviour
    The Behaviour of a Percentageful texts column.
    TaggedMeasureBehaviour
    the Behavior of a Tagged entity (like Classified Actual Expenditures -- expenditures vertically divided by an ACV)
    TextualTokenBehaviour
    A close relative to PercentageTokenBehaviour.
    TrivialMeasureBehaviour
    The behaviour of a trivial measure.
    VarianceMeasureBehaviour
    the behaviour of an entity which equals max(cell) - min(cell)
